CustomField.description: Alert the user on opportunity and quote when there is a mismatch on the Weighted Average Start Date field //GTMS-23000
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Weighted_Average_Start_Date__c)), IF( SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.License_Start_Date__c != Weighted_Average_Start_Date__c, "Opt Didnt Match", "" ) & IF( Weighted_Average_Start_Date__c != SBQQ__RenewalOpportunity__r.SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__StartDate__c, "Quote didnt Match", "" ), "" )
CustomField.label: WASD Equal Opp And Quote
